definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: The eight-roomed dwelling house on No. 1500, Wuzhong Road, Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 上海吳中路1500號八室住宅一棟招租。

sentences.english: Take Inner Ring Road exit Wuzhong Road.
sentences.chinese: 沿着內環高架路，在吳中路出口下。

sentences.english: The No. 8 Bridge project, Jiangguo Zhong Road, Shanghai, is a concret case of the reconstruction of a factory.
sentences.chinese: 上海建國中路八號橋項目是一個工廠改建的實案。

sentences.english: MingFung Moulding Factory. Was established in 1991. which lies in DongCheng Middle Road, in Dong Guan.
sentences.chinese: 明峯制模廠成立於1991年，位於東莞市東城中路。

sentences.english: Equally, the biggest hope was the lumbering performances of Distin and Dunne in City's central defence.
sentences.chinese: 最大的希望是迪斯汀和鄧恩中路防守中笨拙的表現。

sentences.english: In the central midfield, Hitzfeld might be opting for Inler and Dzemaili.
sentences.chinese: 中場中路，希斯菲爾德也許會選擇因勒和德澤梅利。

sentences.english: The challenge around tactics of modern football always be applied in midline of center field and downfield .
sentences.chinese: 現代足球實施圍搶戰術多在中場的中路與後場。

sentences.english: Take me to the airport, please.
It was a horrible penalty - slow, grounded, along the centre.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個可怕的點球，球速慢，地面球，還打向中路。

sentences.english: If this is true, Mayweather is going to have to be careful in protecting his mid section.
sentences.chinese: 果真如此的話，梅威瑟可要小心自己的中路了。

sentences.english: Paolo Maldini was moved from left-back to the heart of the defence, alongside Filippo Galli.
sentences.chinese: 馬爾蒂尼從左後衛移到中路，與加利一起鎮守後防。

sentences.english: Barbie Shanghai is located at 550 Central Huaihai Road.
sentences.chinese: 芭比上海旗艦店位於上海市淮海中路550號。

sentences.english: The Former Site of The Central Committee of The Chinese Communist Youth League is No. 6 Yuyang Road.
sentences.chinese: 上海團中央舊址位於盧灣區淮海中路漁陽裏6號。

sentences.english: A city road. A tree with heavy leaves and branches.
sentences.chinese: 一條城中路，一棵滿是枝葉的樹。

sentences.english: Hoyte is better on the right and Gallas is better in the centre.
sentences.chinese: 霍伊特放在右路更出色而加拉更適合中路防守。

sentences.english: He prefers central midfield where he can influence the game.
sentences.chinese: 他更傾向於在中場中路活動，能夠影響比賽。

definition: (sitting) opposite/across (the street)/directly in front/to be face to face
to start on a journey/to be on one's way
to set up a teammate (with an opportunity to score)/to throw a game
person/number of people/(per) capita/(a person's) head/(Tw) person whose identity is used by sb else (e.g. to create a bogus account)
to arrest/to capture/to seize/to win (a set, a game etc)
corner kick (in soccer)/free strike in hockey
